mapper.select: select count(b.sno) totSize from board b join member m on b.id = m.id where b.subject like '%${findStr}%' or m.nickname like '%${findStr}%' or b.nal like '%${findStr}%'

select b.sno, b.boardtype, b.subject, m.nickname, date_format(b.nal, '%Y-%m-%d') nal, b.viewcount from board b join member m on m.id = b.id WHERE b.id = #{findStr} OR b.subject LIKE '%${findStr}%' or m.nickname like '%${findStr}%' or b.boardtype like '%${findStr}%' or b.nal like '%${findStr}%' order by b.sno desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}
select m.profile_img, m.nickname, b.hashtag, b.nal, b.viewcount, b.subject, b.doc, from member m join board b on m.id = b.id where b.sno = ${sno} and b.boardtype= #{boardtype}
